armor_stat_bonus.vanilla_text:
Mask worn by Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor, in the image of a foreign queen.
Increases dexterity.

Long ago, when Rykard first set eyes on Tanith, she was working as a dancer in a foreign land. Soon, he made her his consort.
She was the only human to remain by his side when he became the serpent of blasphemy.

In that moment, Tanith was truly charmed by him.
armor_stat_bonus.dziggy_text:
Mask worn by Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor, in the image of a foreign queen. Long ago, when Rykard first set eyes on Tanith, she was working as a dancer in a foreign land. Soon, he made her his consort. She was the only human to remain by his side when he became the serpent of blasphemy. In that moment, Tanith was truly charmed by him.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">dexterity</font> by 1.

formatting.layout: lore paragraph, blank line, header, effect line

talisman_multi_stat.vanilla_text:
An eye engraved with an Elden Rune.
Said to be the seal of King Consort Radagon.

Raises vigor, endurance, strength, and dexterity, but also increases damage taken.

These seals represent the lifelong duty of those chosen by the gods.

Raises attributes, but also increases damage taken
talisman_multi_stat.dziggy_text:
An eye engraved with an Elden Rune.
Said to be the seal of King Consort Radagon.

These seals represent the lifelong duty of those chosen by the gods.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">vigor</font>, <font color="#E0B985">endurance</font>, <font color="#E0B985">strength</font>, and <font color="#E0B985">dexterity</font> by 3, but increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 10%.

formatting.penalty_phrasing: but increases all damage received by 10%

spell_multicomponent.vanilla_text:
Sorcery of Adula, the Glintstone Dragon.

Conjures a cold magic greatsword, then delivers a sweeping blow that launches a blade-like projectile of frost.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly.

Adula, a devourer of sorcerers, was bested by Ranni and subsequently swore a knightly oath to her Dark Moon.

Sweeping slash followed by cold blade projectile
spell_multicomponent.dziggy_text:
Sorcery of Adula, the Glintstone Dragon.

Adula, a devourer of sorcerers, was bested by Ranni and subsequently swore a knightly oath to her Dark Moon.

Conjure a large, magical, icy greatsword and swing it horizontally, which launches a large horizontal arc of icy magic. Can be cast repeatedly and on horseback.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (greatsword):</font> 243
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (projectile):</font> 235
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (greatsword):</font> 120
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (projectile):</font> 35
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Cold, Carian Sword

formatting.line_style: Label line per component, no bullets, colon after label

ash_of_war_attack_buff.vanilla_text:
Skill: Determination

A knightly skill.
Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, powering up your next attack.
ash_of_war_attack_buff.dziggy_text:
<font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Determination</font>

Imbue your armament with energy, increasing <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for your next single attack with that armament within 10 seconds by 60%. This effect works for critical attacks as well.

formatting.layout: Skill header line, blank line, effect sentence

consumable_buff.vanilla_text:
A lump of animal flesh pickled in a medicinal solution mixed with fiery spices.
Craftable item.

Temporarily boosts physical attack.

Considered a delicacy in the badlands, this invigorating repast was for the exclusive benefit of those who they deem heroes.

Temporarily boosts physical attack
consumable_buff.dziggy_text:
A lump of animal flesh pickled in a medicinal solution mixed with fiery spices.

Considered a delicacy in the badlands, this invigorating repast was for the exclusive benefit of those who they deem heroes.

Increases <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

Craftable item.

consumable_damage.vanilla_text:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of incendiary materials is sealed inside.

Throw at enemies to inflict fire damage.

Throw at enemies to inflict fire damage
consumable_damage.dziggy_text:
A cocktail of incendiary materials is sealed inside.

Throw at an enemy to inflict <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 230

Craftable item using a Cracked Pot.

formatting.line_breaks: effect line, blank line, base damage line, blank line, craftable note

weapon_skill_lifesteal.vanilla_text:
Skill: Blood Tax

Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood.
Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP.
weapon_skill_lifesteal.dziggy_text:
<font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Blood Tax</font>

Spin around in a circle then rapidly thrust your armament forward 4 times. Each of the first 3 thrusts that hit an enemy will restore 2% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 25, and the final thrust will restore 4% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 45 if it hits an enemy.

formatting.healing_phrasing: Each of the first 3 thrusts... final thrust...
